title: Two cities: London and New York
creator_credit: John H Secondari Productions, Learning Corporation of America, John H. Secondari and Helen Jean Secondari
brief_description: A comparison of the quality of life and approach to urban problems of two western English speaking capital cities. Varied in their ethnic make up, cultural traditions, physical layout and community organisation, London and New York offer very different advantages and problems.
creator_credit_for_label: John H Secondari Productions, Learning Corporation of America, John H. Secondari and Helen Jean Secondari
description: A comparison of the quality of life and approach to urban problems of two western English speaking capital cities. Varied in their ethnic make up, cultural traditions, physical layout and community organisation, London and New York offer very different advantages and problems.
